title: Goodhart's Law
description: "When a measure becomes a target, it ceases to be a good measure."

title: Streisand effect
description: An unintended consequence of attempts to hide or censor information backfire and increase public awareness of the information.

title: The Illusion of Moral Decline
description: At all times in history, there is a perception that morality is in decline. This is likely an illusion, and a product of biased exposure to information and biased memory for information.

title: Sh*tshow Effect
description: The world always seems like it's falling apart, starting just before you were born.

title: Cobra Effect
description: When an incentive unintentionally rewards people for making the issue worse, such as a bounty on cobras making cobra-breeding profitable, resulting in a net increase in cobras.
